text: Except as provided in § 10-511.06, the United States shall not incur any expense or liability whatsoever under or by reason of this subchapter, or be liable under any claim of any nature or kind that may arise from the construction, or the operation or maintenance, of that portion of the tunnel authorized by this subchapter.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Capitol Grounds and Botanic Garden Tunnel.

heading.catch_text: Tunnel under Capitol Grounds and Botanic Garden grounds--United States not to incur expense or liability.
